column4: Hello, when I install the latest drivers from nvidia hopepage (for my nvidia GPU) do I have to remove nvidia-glx prior to installation?
i think so too.. lots of problems later on if you don't

uhm.. after i installed it on my system, the nifty boot splash / framebuffer console would corrupt when i switched between them with ctrl+alt+f1, etc.. i solved it by disabling the splash in the /boot/grub/menu.lst file
